meta_description: GitHub Pages-based portfolio template for tech-savvy Product Managers and Engineers
meta_keywords: portfolio, portfolio template, portfolio for engineers
pitch: An awesome person who can do rad shit

About.section_data: This is a portfolio template made for tech people and published with GitHub Pages. You can fork it on GitHub (see link below), update data.json with your content, publish with GitHub Pages the same way and use it as your personal portfolio üëç

Projects.section_explanatory_text: Below you can list your projects:

section_data.project_description: Here you can describe project outcomes and provide screenshots / pictures. Click on an image to open it full size.
